name: Cookie and Tickle Shimmer Finish Powder Highlighters
about: What it is:A silky-soft, superfine powder highlighter..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance..What Else You Need to Know:These powder highlighters feel featherlight, sweep on effortlessly, and build easily. Get Cookie for a warm, delicious golden shimmer. Go with Tickle for a perfectly tickled-pink, luminous look.
ingredients: Dimethicone, Mica, Alumina, Isododecane, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Triethylhexanoin, Polyethylene, Magnesium Myristate, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Peg-12 Dimethicone, Tin Oxide.  [+/-:  Ci 15850 (Red 6, Red 7, Red 7 Lake), Ci 15985 (Yellow 6, Yellow 6 Lake), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5, Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 42090 (Blue 1 Lake), Ci 45410 (Red 27, Red 27 Lake, Red 28 Lake), Ci 73360 (Red 30, Red 30 Lake), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 77163 (Bismuth Oxychloride), Ci 77288 (Chromium Oxide Greens), Ci 77289 (Chromium Hydroxide Green), Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77510 (Ferric Ferrocyanide, Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide), Ci 77742 (Manganese Violet), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide)]. ..Product ingredient listings are updated periodically. Before using a Benefit Cosmetics product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.- Sweep along cheekbones or anywhere you want to highlight, like the bridge of your nose or Cupidu2019s bow. Blend & build as desired on bare face or over makeup..- Want a full glam glow? Pair Cookie or Tickle with any of Benefit's WANDERful World blushes. Top it off with award-winning Hoola matte bronzer.

reviews.review_title: Try it on in store before purchasing
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As another reviewer has said, even though this highlighter looks pink, it goes on gold. The pros are that it is a straight metallic highlight with no pigment, meaning that it would look great on any skin tone. However, if you textured skin on your cheek area, you might not like the way this looks on you (speaking from personal experience). I also tried the Benefit Dandelion Twinkle and it looks way better on my textured cheek! It has no background pigment and instead of being metallic, it' almost looks like a superfine glitter. I would say the sparkles are so fine that it would look great for a no-makeup makeup look. Even though I don't like it as much as the other, I kind of wish Tickle came in a mini cause I definitely would have purchased it. I suggest you try both on in store to see which one works best for you.

reviews.review_text: I have so many highlighters in my drawer, in powder, cream, stick, and liquid formulas, because I am always trying to find the one that has just the right subtle shimmer, but Iu2019ve never been quite satisfiedu2026until now. Cookie is a lovely, soft powder, with just the right amount of soft golden shimmer to it. (You can, of course, apply more or less of it to control the level of highlighting shimmer.) It is so pretty, without looking either overly glittery (I am definitely too old for that!) or looking so subtle that I can barely see the slightest difference whatsoever on my face. I use it on the tops of my cheekbones, across the top of my forehead, a little bit down the bridge of my nose, and, even, a small amount in the center of whatever eyeshadow I am wearing, to give just a subtle little pop in the center of my lids, without looking overdone. For background, I'm a huge highlighter girl but the past several years I've exclusively stuck with liquid highlighters as I just haven't been impressed with many powder highlighters on the market due to their tendency to not last the whole day, have underwhelming colour pay off, or sometimes just sit weird on my skin. However this lil dude has changed my mind and made his way into my top 2 all time favourite highlighters. The texture is buttery smooth, the colour is a perfect shade of champagne (not too cool, not too warm), and of course the nostalgic Benefit packaging. This will definitely last me over 1.5 years even with heavy use and honestly beats 99% of the highlighters that have a huge cult following for a smaller price tag and without the chalkiness I find many of them have.

I normally use one of the Anastasia highlighter quads because those are my favorite but I've been liking this one more as of right now. It's very wet and no chunky glitter at all it works great on me (I'm very fair) and my best friends (medium tan) and it melts into the foundation seamlessly. It's also a super bomb inner corner highlight, and easy to build up intensity. I really love the packaging also! It's so cute and she has curly hair like me which I love!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this highlighter! It gives you a very nice glow, and it is not overly glittery. It definitely stands out, but isn't too over the top. This was exactly what I was looking for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this highlighter! The glow is great! It completes the full look. Highly recommend getting it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This highlight is stunning, very blinding. The formula is soft and amazing. Itu2019s very glittery when you first apply in my personal opinion so if you donu2019t like glitter I would definitely pass on this one but if you do, get it. Itu2019s really beautiful. A gold pearl is a good description for it when you swatch it on skin but when you actually apply it as a highlight it is more silver for sure. The reason I didnu2019t rate it 5 stars is because the packaging is cheap cardboard. I know some people donu2019t mind stuff like that but I like nice packaging especially for a 30 dollar price tag for a highlighter lol but wonu2019t stop me from using it because itu2019s still stunning

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This highlighter is so beautiful. I love the shade and it looks amazing on my fair skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautifully blinding highlight, no grainy glittery look to it. Apply lightly for a natural look or build it up for a more dramatic effect. Bought it after seeing Jaclyn Hillu2019s YouTube review and Iu2019m so glad I discovered this. Just like all Benefitu2019s blush, bronzers the packaging is bulky and unnecessary and the brush is pretty useless, but that doesnu2019t change how much I love this highlighter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: On a scale of 1-10, I give this highlighter 100. Itu2019s creamy and gives the perfect glow to any average makeup look, without being too frosty or warm. I love it, especially for my neutral undertones! Iu2019ve worn it without any base at all and with a full face!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely stunning!!! Heard about it from Jaclyn Hill and boy oh boy, was she right!! I never loved how highlighters brought out my skins texture. But this doesnu2019t! Itu2019s a glow from within! Absolutely stunning!! Blinding highlight, that somehow looks natural! Would recommend this to anyone! Definitely a staple! Not a major fan of the packaging though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the color of this highlighter. It doesnu2019t seem very obvious but then when I turn my head and it catches light, it really looks lit from within. The part I like most about the product is the formulation. It is like powder but not dry. It goes on smooth, stays all day but washes off easily. If all their little boxes are this consistency, I will need to purchase all the shades!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this highlighter! It is not glittery and the formula is very different from the previous highlighter formula. This one is almost buttery to touch and there is no perfumy fragrance that I can smell with this one ( it does have a little bit of a chemical scent but not heavy). It is a lighter colored highlight, for darker skin it will probably have a whiter base rather than a beige or gold undertone but still can be worn beautifully. It can be a blinding highlight if needed to be. I personally tend not to like blinding highlights but this one if applied and distributed with the finger it becomes a wet and natural glow and it is beautiful! So it can do both and really depend on your preference, it is stunning either way. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best highlighter ever so wet looking and bling bling but not crazy glitter perfect

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down the best highlighter ever created! If you love highlighter then you need this one in your life! Thatu2019s all I gotta say!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: benefit nailed this highlight, Iu2019m so happy they brought this out as a single - glides on like butter and the colour is everything

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite highlighter ever! I would usually switch my highlighter around to some of the u201ccult favoritesu201d but this is all Iu2019ve been wearing for months. So excited it came out in a single. Very nice wet look

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This highlighter is blinding! I have to use a very light hand, and it looks beautiful on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I got this highlight in the mini palette this spring and almost immediately went back for the larger palette in order to get this highlight in full-size. It can make my skin look a little more textured on oily days, but over the right primer, it goes on like a dream and stays on all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the color, consistency, and wear of this highlight so much. It looks good with any look I go with. I also love putting this in the inner corner of my eyes as it gives it such a beautiful brightness effect. This highlight wears all day/night long and looks amazing no matter how long itu2019s worn for!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best highlight ever. Itu2019s creamy and blinding and doesnu2019t leave a dark cast on my fair skin. This is the only powder highlight Iu2019ll use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Buy this now!! I never couldu2019ve imagined how beautiful this would look on my pale skin, but WOW! It doesnu2019t emphasize any of my texture and glows like none of my other highlighters do! I will be purchasing a back up of this so that Iu2019m never without it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: Nothing Special but Not Bad at all!

reviews.review_text: it's definitely pretty. But the color almost came across as silvery on me right now. I have medium olive skin. The Tickle highlighter was a much better shade for my skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: This highlighter is everything! Iu2019m so happy itu2019s finally in a single. I had to buy another large palette cause I was almost out. I love this as my inner corner highlight too.

reviews.review_text: I love this highlighter and itu2019s my new holy grail! reviews.review_text: Great highlight, looks like sunshine bursting from your cheeks

reviews.review_text: This is a really great highlighter!! Itu2019s not over the top blinding and not to glittery. You can build up to a nice and beautiful shimmer. Very flattering and didnu2019t bring up much texture to the skin!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this highlighter! It works perfectly for more natural & less intense looks, but it also builds up really well in order to wear with full glam. I definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_text: A little goes a long way with this highlighter as it is very pigmented. It is the perfect shade for fair and light skin tones. If you are looking for a beaming highlighter this is it. This highlighter stayed on my dry/combo skin for more than 8 hours without fading.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful, creamy highlight! Can go subtle or make it blinding. So happy they released this in a single.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely beautiful!  I was a bit nervous it would be too light for my medium tan skin.  I have over 30 highlighters and this is a new fave.  It shows less texture than most. Very silky soft application!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So glad they decided to sell this individually. Itu2019s the most beautiful highlighter Iu2019ve ever tried! Definitely my new holy grail!

reviews.review_text: I figured this was an overhyped product. I heard Jaclyn Hill talk about it awhile back. She raved about it in fact. Truth is, it's worth the hype and then some. It is seriously so beautiful, blinding, smooth, and lasts a long time on my cheek bones. It's the highlighter you don't think you need but you do and you have will love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After all the hype of this product I was super excited to pick this up. It swatches really nicely and looks like it will be great. But, on the skin this looked so chalky and powdery. I wasnu2019t getting any u2018metallicu2019 or sheen, it just looked bad. Iu2019ve never really disliked a highlight before this which Iu2019m shocked by. Iu2019m not sure if this just isnu2019t good for my skin tone (NC25) but it looked like a white stripe that didnu2019t even look like a highlight. I have other highlights that I love so I returned this. I have never liked benefits big bulky packaging but the brush in this felt much softer than their other products so in this case it didnu2019t bother me as much that they have the brush in this. Considering how much people like this highlight I feel like Iu2019m missing something so I would say try it but if you can, try it on your face instead of just swatching it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my all time favorite highlighter!! This is the most beautiful color that I have ever seen & put on my face!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s a beautiful highlighter. And iu2019m obsessed with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: DA BESTTTTT highlighter ever !!! My go to , doesnu2019t show the skin texture, loveeeee itttttttt

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't get this when the set came out because I can't stand another Hoola in my collection (I have 3). I had to buy it when this came out.  It is a very shiny highlighter. It has a weird, almost cream-like consistency, I think that's because the first ingredient is dimethicone. The consistency is actually making the highlighter a little difficult to apply, almost patchy with brushes. I think this is probably best applied with your fingers.  I still love this highlighter though. There's something different about the way it glows, and it doesn't really exaggerate textures that much like a lot of the really shiny highlighters. I'm glad I purchased it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been recommending this highlight to my friends since I bought the cheekleaders palette (which is bomb) and i'm so glad they came out with an individual box highlight! I've been a huge fan of the balm cosmetics Mary Loumanizer highlight for years, but i haven't reached for it since I discovered this highlight. It's the creamiest, blendable formula. I also like to use it on my eyes as an inner corner highlight or on the lid for a pop. I've been wearing it to work and I know it's blinding my coworkers, but i really enjoy catching a glimpse of that bomb highlight in the bathroom mirror and every other reflective surface. Just buy it, or the cheekleaders palette, you won't be disappointed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly the best highlighter I have ever used!!!! Makes me look super glowy!!! Omg itu2019s super pretty I canu2019t get over how beautiful it is!

One layer gives you this realistic glossy sheen and it can easily build up to a full blown glamorous metallic finish without accentuating texture. I would say this is for people who prefer a solid reflective highlighter. 4 stars because I feel like this may not be entirely office appropriate if you are looking for something on a subtle glow from within finish. It does have tiny micro glitters for the extra oomph. Definitely a highlighter on heavy rotation for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This highlighter has to be the creamiest formula Iu2019ve ever encountered. The glow is blinding and itu2019s truly very pretty. However, I have medium skin with warm yellow undertones, and it doesnu2019t compliment my skintone very well. Because of this reason, I use it very sparingly, which still makes it wearable for my skintone. I find that this suits people with a lighter skintone than mine.

reviews.review_title: HOLY GRAIL HIGHLIGHTER - you NEED this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_text: I love the simplicity of this highlighter, and the little brush applicator that comes with is shaped a little more rounded than the bronzer brush applicators. The brush makes it easy to apply, and it seems to have a more shimmery quality as opposed to glittery. I donu2019t typically use intense highlighters, so I apply very little to get the desired affect. I do believe it could be applied as a much more intense highlight, depending on how much product you pickup on the brush. The formula is pretty buttery and creamy too I feel like. Overall a really nice highlighter for any kind of look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So glad this is finally a single! I originally purchased this in the cheekleader trio and OMG. Cookie quickly became a favorite for me! Itu2019s so beautiful. Itu2019s not dry and powdery and itu2019s not super glittery. It just gives you a beautiful glow. You can go lighthanded with it for a more natural glow or you can build it up a bit. Itu2019s also not overly golden, something I struggle with as someone with really fair skin. Some golden toned highlighters tend to look a bit off on my skin. This one does not have that problem at all.   Iu2019ve actually made a fairly decent dent in mine already and thatu2019s rare for me with a highlight. I definitely recommend this one and will continue to repurchase it!

reviews.review_text: I was excited when I saw this! I had to pick it up and I am loving it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Like many other people, I bought the Cheekleader palette a few months ago, and I INSTANTLY fell in love with this highlighter, and the first thing I thought when I first used it was, they HAVE to make this as a single highlighter; they'll make so much money off of it once people realize how amazing it is! I'm SO glad they did that. First off, this highlighter is INTENSE right off the bat, so if you like a more natural highlight, this isn't for you. Even though it's intense, it's just got that perfect blinding wet look without looking too glittery or emphasizing texture (and I have fairly textured skin.) I may have to go buy the individual even though I have the palette. Do yourself a favor and get this highlight! You won't be sorry!

reviews.review_text: I bought the Cheekleader palette just for this shade - glad they finally came out with it as a single (although too late for me).  It's absolutely gorgeous and a truly beautiful highlighter.

reviews.review_text: You've got to give it up to Benefit for listening to their customers and DELIVERING by giving us Cookie in a single pan - this is seriously one of the most beautiful, silky, and blinding highlighters on the market! It's very buildable so you can go from soft dewey sheen to glowing for the gods realness, whichever you prefer. Most champagne highlighters emphasize texture on my cheekbones but not this baby - I'm also a big fan of the pan, I hate fan brushes

reviews.review_text: I love this highlight! reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am a makeup junkie probably with 15+ powder highlights in my collection, this is by far the most intense. This is a wham bam, glow to the gods, shine into space type highlighter so if you like something subtle or more sheeny then this is not for you. This is so intense from the get to, no build up required, donu2019t need to wet your brush. This doesnu2019t feel extremely powdery, kinda like the color pop formula but not quite as bouncy and more pressed but still that light and airy formula. I would say this is a light champagne shade, not gold, not silver, but light champagne. Itu2019s stunning and thereu2019s nothing bad I can say about it.

reviews.review_text: I am so happy to see they came out with this highlighter on its own!!! I bought the cheerleader palette solely because of this highlighter. Itu2019s so stunning and blinding. Highly recommend!!

reviews.review_text: I have this highlighter in that cheek pallet that Benefit released earlier this year, and MY GOD this is one of my favorite highlighters of all time. Jaclyn Hill and Kathleen Lights both spoke about it in their videos from a while back, which is the reason why I bought it, but now itu2019s finally launched on its own. The only reason I gave it a 4 stars is because Iu2019m not sure if the formula has changed, otherwise this is a 5 Star product for sure!!!

Smooth, pigmented, and highly reflective. Definitely beautiful on fair/light skin; canu2019t speak to how it would look on darker skin tones.

reviews.review_title: TIME BEST HIGHLIGHT u2013 HANDS DOWN
